@ fuzzywuzzyz:
Sounds like you need to download and install Adobe Reader. This is a free program by Adobe that allows you to read PDF files. You can download it here: http://www.adobe.com/products/acrobat/readstep2.html?promoid=BUIGO

Also, regarding Metamap for the latest patch (2.4), MacReiben has released a "pre-version" which you can download on his website. http://macreiben.net/?Metamap

I have not tested this personally, and it may be in French, I'm currently using the guide without the waypoints, etc. so feel free to speak up if you have a version of Metamap that's working for 2.4
The 2.4 meta-map from the site is in English and works fine.  The guide is awesome, thanks a lot, been using it to level many characters.
